column2: BRIEF-NVR Inc Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share Of $39.34 April 19 (Reuters) - NVR Inc: * Q1 REVENUE $1.529 BILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $1.47 BILLION * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $31.79 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * IN HOMEBUILDING SECTION, HOMEBUILDING REVENUES IN Q1 OF 2018 TOTALED $1.49 BILLION, 19% HIGHER THAN YEAR EARLIER PERIOD * IN HOMEBUILDING SECTION, NEW ORDERS IN Q1 2018, INCREASED 17% TO 5,174 UNITS, WHEN COMPARED TO 4,424 UNITS IN Q1 OF 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
